channel.title: GSC Chatroom (MSMC)
channel.description:
I wanted to create a Ventrilo or TeamSpeak server, but I didn't want to have to pay, and I wanted service that didn't suck. So, I came across GSC which actually shows to be a very decent program. A 200-slot server gets hosted for free with good speed. I gave it a shot and here I am.
Go to www.getgsc.com, create an account, and download their program. Once you launch it and sign in, click on the Voice tab, click Add, and type in this connection info:
[b]IP:[/b] 8.3.28.2 [b]Port:[/b] 8269
Or put this link into your browser: gsc://join:8.3.28.2:8269/
There is no channel. We chat in the lobby, but maybe that will change in the future. I don't know.
So now that that's all out of the way, this is a voice-chatting program/server for the people of our community who play Minecraft. Currently, the settings are easy-going: Constantly-chat is enabled, there is no password, and anyone can talk. This will only change if necessary. Keep note you do [b]not[/b] need a microphone, as there you can send and receive text messages. However it's likely not everyone will read these. :)
I look forward to seeing you guys. Oh, and it's not official, but there isn't a voice-chatting server here yet, so you might as well join if you want to.
[b]Note:[/b] If you get an error trying to open Minecraft, close this, run Minecraft, and then open this again. Chances are GSC was made in Java and requests too much memory.
~Lin

item.title: GSC Chatroom (MSMC)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:18, topic:378694”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=474556.msg3470493#msg3470493 date=1295256267]
Mumble is 1000x better than anything else out there. You guys should at least try it out.

Also, what else provides a client for anything but Windows? Minecraft is a cross-platform game isn’t it? So don’t we need a cross-platform talk server?
[/quote]
I tried Mumble, but it said remote host closed the connection.[/quote]

It wasn’t running until a minute ago, oops.

Read full topic

item.title: GSC Chatroom (MSMC)
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:7, topic:378694”]Does anyone even use the mumble?[/quote]I doubt it. You should try and use this. LilXCj and I are lonely.

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:9, topic:378694”]I cant connect to that mumble server -.-

btw Daivdi, is the MoparCraft server up?[/quote]You too.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:6, topic:378694”]Moparisthebest has the mumble server for us Lin :P[/quote]And you. Besides, this program seems a lot better as you can have friends and it’s primarily for gaming. I’m not sure about the features of Mumble.

Read full topic

So now that that’s all out of the way, this is a voice-chatting program/server for the people of our community who play Minecraft.
